Licensing of Traders Act, No. 62 of 1961
AN ACT TO MARE PROVISION FOR TRE LICENSING
OF TRADERS, FOR ENSURING THE MAINTENANCE
OF BUSINESS STANDARDS AND MORALITY, FOR
ENABLING THE. MAINTENANCE OF AIR AND
STABLE PRICES IN SSSENTIAL CONSUMER COM-
MODITES, AND FOR MATTERS CONNECTED
THEREWITH OR INCIDENTAL THERETO.

(2) No punitive order shall be made against
any treder in any article except after notice to
him to show cause, within such period as may be
specified in the notice, why such order should
not be made, and except on his failing to show
cause within such period or on his not showing
sufficient cause,
